column5: The universe is sending us a belated Christmas gift, or maybe it's a reward for enduring the polar vortex weather: The northern lights will be visible across most of Canada tonight. Seriously! The sun has emitted a strong solar flare that's pushing the light show south, so expect to see shimmering colours in the night sky. Here are the details: http://on-msn.com/1diBDGu
Pretty Cool, I wonder if Southern Ontario is close enough to see them tonight. Will be watching out over lake simcoe.
Someone on the radio said it was going to happen early Thursday, which  has already passed! I was up at three this morning but it was cloudy

The University of Alaska's Geophysical Institute predicts much of Canada and the northern fringes of the U.S. should be able to see the northern lights. Chicago, Boston, Cleveland, Seattle and Des Moines might see the shimmering colours low on the horizon.
Well at 4am i did not see any more lights this morning other then the normal flashback lights I see daily.  Will have a look tomorrow morning if the clouds break
This is a tool I use for predictions on when the Northern Lights *might* be visible..  Not looking good for tonight/early tomorrow.  http://helios.swpc.noaa.gov/ovation/index.html

This is a tool I use for predictions on when the Northern Lights *might* be visible..  Not looking good for tonight/early tomorrow.  http://helios.swpc.noaa.gov/ovation/index.html  I use this tool as to whether I should get me arse off the couch and have a look out the window!!!  http://www.asc-csa.gc.ca/eng/astronomy/auroramax/connect.asp
we are cloudy...but i think ill go for a coffee and check out the lake...
I think the prime time around here is going to be 2-3am..   I might set the alarm and drive a bit north towards Parry Sound.
Cloudy here in bobcaygeon been looking a few times since 2am nothing here !!!!
We had some clear skies last evening but couldn't see the lights and now it's snowing so I spose I'm outta luck this time around.
Checked a couple of times last night and again this morning, no luck here either.
Theya re screwing with us! They just want us to get up when Lew does! It's working!
They just want us to get up when Lew does!  But at least I had company when I couldn't find the Northern Lights
Didn't see anything up here either.Starlit at 11pm last night but nothing glowing.
